Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp17
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
RemoteController, Remote
public class Controller extends Object implements RemoteController
Controller class, manages player input and sends messages to the model
Author:
Gabriel Leonardi
